item.title: New preprint: Efficient use of harvest data: An integrated population model for exploited animal populations
item.description:
New #preprint by @MGamelon on "Efficient use of harvest data: An integrated population model for exploited animal populations" https://t.co/s2nVkphPTe in which we combine data on dead and alive animals to infer population dynamics of the fascinating wild boar pic.twitter.com/MuJNXWjYZ5

— Olivier Gimenez ðŸ–– (@oaggimenez) September 20 2019
